abstract: Former top-10 tennis player Mardy Fish announces that he will retire after United States Open.
lead_paragraph: Fish, a former top-10 player, announced that the United States Open would be the last tournament of his career.

headline.main: Mardy Fish to End His Career at U.S. Open
headline.print_headline: Fish to End His Career at U.S. Open

snippet: Fish, a former top-10 player, announced that the United States Open would be the last tournament of his career.
